This spring, I'll be giving talks at a couple of Meetups and conferences:

<br>

![](https://www.meetup.com/mu_static/de-DE/logo--script.004ada05.svg)

- March, 26th: At the [data lounge Bremen, I'll be talking about Explainable Machine Learning](http://meetu.ps/e/GlST9/w54bW/f)

- April, 11th: At the [Data Science Meetup Bielefeld, I'll be talking about Building Interpretable Neural Networks with Keras and LIME](http://meetu.ps/e/G8yg1/w54bW/f)

<br>

![](https://www.m3-konferenz.de/2018/common/images/konferenzen/m3text.svg)

- May, 14th: At the [M3 conference in Mannheim, a colleague and I will give our workshop on building production-ready machine learning models with Keras, Luigi, DVC and TensorFlow Serving](https://www.m3-konferenz.de/lecture.php?id=8533&source=0)

- May, 15th: At the same conference, [I'll be giving a talk about TensorFlow Probability](https://www.m3-konferenz.de/lecture.php?id=7861&source=0)

<br>

If you happen to be at any of these events, please come and say Hi! I'd love to connect. :-)
